plot: Journey through a land of unending surprises, a land of dramatic highlands and badlands and ancient panoramas. Explore Monument Valley, the Grand Canyon, mazes in the Goosenecks, dinosaur tracks in Painted Desert and Lake Powell.
title: Secrets of the Southwest
plot_es: Journey through a land of unending surprises, a land of dramatic highlands and badlands and ancient panoramas. Explore Monument Valley, the Grand Canyon, mazes in the Goosenecks, dinosaur tracks in Painted Desert and Lake Powell.
plot_en: Journey through a land of unending surprises, a land of dramatic highlands and badlands and ancient panoramas. Explore Monument Valley, the Grand Canyon, mazes in the Goosenecks, dinosaur tracks in Painted Desert and Lake Powell.
